original_title: I'm Just A Layman in Pursuit of Justice: Black Farmers Fight Against USDA
overview: "I’m Just a Layman in Pursuit of Justice" chronicles the injustices of the U.S. Department of Agriculture, also known as ‘the last plantation,’ and the lived experiences of Black farmers who chose to fight against discrimination.
title: I'm Just A Layman in Pursuit of Justice: Black Farmers Fight Against USDA
